Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.18008336]Virus:HIV:inhibition the cytopathic effects of HIV-1 infection in cultured human T-lymphoblast (CEM-SS) cells(EC50=440 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref:16872274] It has 3% hemolytic activity at 1.0 μM and 13% hemolytic activity at 1.5 μM against human type A red blood cells
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Cycloviolacin O14 is shown to contain the CCK motif.
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism. Has hemolytic activity.
Sequence Information.PTM: This is a cyclic peptide which may contain three disulfide bonds 6-20; 10-22; 15-27.

Literature.Title: A novel suite of cyclotides from Viola odorata sequence variation and the implications for structure, function and stability.
Literature.Author: Ireland DC, Colgrave ML, Craik DJ.

Literature.Title: Cyclotides as natural anti-HIV agents.
Literature.Author: Ireland DC, Wang CK, Wilson JA, Gustafson KR, Craik DJ.
